subject: Public Speaking
title: Voice Modulation for Stories
description: Learn Voice Modulation for Stories in one minute.

hook.text: Flat delivery kills the best story. Your voice IS the instrument.

buildup.text: Lower pitch for tension. Higher for excitement. Slower for gravity.

discovery.text: Match your vocal energy to the emotional beat of the story.

twist.text: Practice vocal range. Most speakers use only 20% of their range.

climax.text: Your voice should be a movie soundtrack for the story.

punchline.text: Modulate your voice. It's the storytelling tool.

quiz.question: Why modulate voice?
options: Match vocal energy to story emotion
